name: Acquiese - A Game About Something
description:
What's it about?

Definitions, strange dialogue, and nonsense.

What's the goal?

To highlight all of the acquieses, sometimes.

How do you play?

A lot of buttons are used, including the 'up arrow', the letter 'A', and left click. You'll figure it out when you get started.

Why did you mispell Acquiesce?

I didn't. It's a different word, and definitely not anything else.

Especially not a mistake.

Please don't think it's a mistake.

Blame PereBite's Indigestible Jam's 1 week time restraint for any issues.

Please understand.
